[vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” overlay_strength=”0.3″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_video link=”https://youtu.be/zUoUuPMCz9Q” align=”center”][vc_column_text]

FIXED OPS DIGITAL Receives the AWA Award in the Fixed Ops Category

 

From The Wynn in Las Vegas, February 13th, 2020 — For over a decade, the AWA Awards have been the benchmark for digital marketing strategies, products, technology, and design in the automotive industry. The most innovative, bold, and successful vendors are rewarded each year in several contemporary categories. 

FIXED OPS DIGITAL is proud to take home achievements in the fixed ops space. 

This award has genuinely helped us cap a spectacular 2019, and open 2020 with our best foot forward.

No matter which product we are providing a dealer with, our mission is as it will always be, “To bring advanced digital marketing tactics to automotive service marketing. Helping franchise dealerships gain back market share from national quick lube chains.”

Our entire team works very hard on a day-to-day basis to bring this statement to life. Whether that be through creating dealer wallet coupons, strategizing new SEO tactics, building SEM campaigns, developing a website, or establishing a recall presence.

We put the dealership first and sincerely strive to create a partnership.

Your service department can become a profitable powerhouse in your market, which likely includes multiple third-party businesses. Partnering with us is the first step in that journey.  

The fixed ops environment will continue to evolve in 2020, and trust us; no one knows how good your department is… let us help them find out!

— Thank you to the AWA Awards for honoring vendors and The Wynn for hosting an excellent show. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
